description:
Download YouTube videos as MP3, MP4 and WAV with resume, trim clips, snapshots, short URL copy, and smart failed download manager fast & accessible for NVDA users.
Hot Keys:
NVDA+Y
Single Tap : DownloadMP3
Double Tap : DownloadMP4
Tripple Tap : DownloadWav
CTRL+Shift+Y
Single Tap : Open Context Menu
Double Tap : Open Destination Floder
NVDA+Shift+Y : Toggle playlist mode
ALT+Windows+Y : Cycle MP3 quality

translations.description:
YouTube-Videos als MP3, MP4, WAV herunterladen mit Fortsetzen, Clips zuschneiden, Screenshots, kurze URL-Kopie und intelligentem Download-Fehler-Manager schnell & barrierefrei für NVDA-Nutzer.
Hot Keys:
NVDA+Y
Einzel-Tipp: DownloadMP3
Doppel-Tipp: DownloadMP4
Dreifach-Tipp: DownloadWav
CTRL+Shift+Y
Einzel-Tipp: Open Context Menu
Doppel-Tipp: Open Destination Folder
NVDA+Shift+Y : Toggle playlist mode
ALT+Windows+Y : Cycle MP3 quality

Download YouTube videos as MP3, MP4 and WAV with resume, trim clips, snapshots, short URL copy, and smart failed download manager fast & accessible for NVDA users.
Hot Keys:
NVDA+Y
Single Tap : DownloadMP3
Double Tap : DownloadMP4
Tripple Tap : DownloadWav
CTRL+Shift+Y
Single Tap : Open Context Menu
Double Tap : Open Destination Floder
NVDA+Shift+Y : Toggle playlist mode
ALT+Windows+Y : Cycle MP3 quality

Descarga videos de YouTube como MP3, MP4, WAV con reanudación, recorte de clips, capturas, copia de URL corta y gestor inteligente de descargas fallidas rápido y accesible para usuarios de NVDA.
Hot Keys:
NVDA+Y
Toque simple: DownloadMP3
Toque doble: DownloadMP4
Toque triple: DownloadWav
CTRL+Shift+Y
Toque simple: Open Context Menu
Toque doble: Open Destination Folder
NVDA+Shift+Y : Toggle playlist mode
ALT+Windows+Y : Cycle MP3 quality

Téléchargez des vidéos YouTube en MP3, MP4, WAV avec reprise, découpage de clips, captures d'écran, copie d'URL courte et gestion intelligente des téléchargements échoués rapide et accessible pour les utilisateurs NVDA.
Hot Keys:
NVDA+Y
Appui simple: DownloadMP3
Appui double: DownloadMP4
Appui triple: DownloadWav
CTRL+Shift+Y
Appui simple: Open Context Menu
Appui double: Open Destination Folder
NVDA+Shift+Y : Toggle playlist mode
ALT+Windows+Y : Cycle MP3 quality

Скачивание видео YouTube в MP3, MP4, WAV с возобновлением, обрезкой клипов, снимками, копированием короткой URL и умным менеджером неудачных загрузок быстро и доступно для пользователей NVDA.
Hot Keys:
NVDA+Y
Один тап: DownloadMP3
Двойной тап: DownloadMP4
Тройной тап: DownloadWav
CTRL+Shift+Y
Один тап: Open Context Menu
Двойной тап: Open Destination Folder
NVDA+Shift+Y : Toggle playlist mode
ALT+Windows+Y : Cycle MP3 quality
